short_summary: Ixia Maintenance and Support Renewal (AMD 001) for FY 22-23
description: Ixia maintenance and support for the AMD 001 program
duration_in_months: If the contract duration is specified, insert the duration in months. Otherwise, keep this field empty.
full_summary:
# Notice: Ixia Service Maintenance and Support Renewal

**Reference:** SSC-22-00020414:T
**Publication Date:** 12th October 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** 25th October 2022 (11:00 AM)

**Bid Solicitation:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description:** The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has issued a new request for proposal (RFP) for Ixia service maintenance and support renewal. The proposed maintenance and support services cover the Ixia equipment and software used by SSC.

**Eligibility:** Bids are invited from qualified vendors who can provide maintenance and support services for Ixia equipment and software.

**Key Details:**

* **Duration:** The proposed maintenance and support services shall commence on an earliest date mutually agreed upon by the parties
* **Delivery Location:** The maintenance and support services shall be delivered in Canada.
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Contact Information:**

  - **Name:** Dimeji Temidire
  - **Email:** dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca
  - **Phone:** 613-618-2048

**Attachments:**

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5B928A6C-7BA5-48D0-8BB1-BC32A04A6257 (Bidder's Guide)
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E330039A-A19F-4CAF-B5F8-5BC1744A6D32 (Bidder's toolkit)
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/947DF163-D518-43CF-86DA-7F958F17FA6D (Maintenance and Support Agreement)
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/63C26D4A-3C85-4058-9BE5-45F92552C4EB (Technical Specifications)

**Language of Tender:** Both English and French.

By not including irrelevant information, reducing the usage of filler words, and ensuring that the structure of the rewritten text adheres to professional conventions, the revised entry adheres to strict word limits, enhancing readability, and eliminates unnecessary information.
